Rulings.Edison:
●Kinka-Byo's effect targets 1 Level 1 monster in your GY and continues to target it while it is on the field.
●Removing the Special Summoned monster from play when Kinka-Byo is removed from the field does not start a Chain.
●When Kinka-Byo is flipped face-down its effect disappears. If it is flipped face-up and Special Summons another Level 1 monster, when it is removed from the field only the newly Special Summoned Level 1 monster is removed from play. The previously Special Summoned Level 1 monster remains on the field.
●If you Special Summon Arcana Force 0 - The Fool with Kinka-Byo's effect and the coin toss for Arcana Force 0 - The Fool is heads, Kinka-Byo's effect is negated and it is destroyed. Arcana Force 0 - The Fool remains on the field.

Rulings.Cat:
● 'Kinka-Byo's' effect targets 1 LV 1 monster in your GY and continues to target it while it is on the field.
● Removing the Special Summoned monster from play when 'Kinka-Byo' leaves the field does not start a Chain.
● When 'Kinka-Byo' is flipped face-down its effect disappears. If it is flipped face-up and Special Summons another LV 1 monster, when it leaves the field only the newly Special Summoned LV 1 monster is removed from play. The previously Special Summoned LV 1 monster remains on the field.
● If you Special Summon 'Arcana Force 0 - The Fool' with 'Kinka-Byo's' effect and the coin toss for 'Arcana Force 0 - The Fool' is heads, 'Kinka-Byo's' effect is negated and it is destroyed. 'Arcana Force 0 - The Fool' remains on the field.

Rulings.Base:
1. The effect of "Kinka-byo" targets 1 Level 1 monster in your GY and continues to target it while it is on the field.
2. Removing the Special Summoned monster from play when "Kinka-byo" is removed from the field does not start a Chain.
3. When "Kinka-byo" is flipped face-down its effect disappears. If it is flipped face-up and Special Summons another Level 1 monster, when it is removed from the field only the newly Special Summoned Level 1 monster is removed from play. The previously Special Summoned Level 1 monster remains on the field.
4. If you Special Summon "Arcana Force 0 - The Fool" with the effect of "Kinka-byo" and the coin toss for "Arcana Force 0 - The Fool" is heads, the effect of "Kinka-byo" is negated and it is destroyed. "Arcana Force 0 - The Fool" remains on the field.
5. The following rules apply to all Spirit Monsters:
6. Spirit is not a monster Type; you cannot declare "Spirit" for the effect of "DNA Surgery".
7. Spirit Monsters are still Effect Monsters.
8. A Spirit Monster must be face-up on the field during the End Phase for it to return to the owner's hand. If it was destroyed or removed from play, it will not return to the owner's hand.
9. A Spirit Monster will return to the owner's hand during the End Phase, even if the opponent played it from their hand (through the effect of "Exchange".)

PSCT.Base: Cannot be Special Summoned. When this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: You can target 1 Level 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target, but banish it when this card leaves the field. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Normal Summoned or flipped face-up this turn: Return it to the hand.
